title: Didnt receive the rreward
body:
Hi guys i didnt receive the reward yet its normal ?

Am gold and its my first season at this game !

replies.body: We can provide some more context individually on your specific issue, through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Hit us up there, and we'll reply as soon as we can.
Um, can you please use proper English? I have no idea what you're trying to say.
